title: Metallica Discography (51 CDs TOTAL)
description:
This Discography Is For Serious Fans. It Is Compiled Of All The Bootleg Perfomances I Could Find In MP3 Format , All the Studio Albums In Lossless FLAC Format , And All The EP's I Know Of. And The Coveted No Life Till Leather DEMO TAPE. ENJOY!!


OVER 55 HOURS OF METALLICA!!!!
